news_header: Several companies are set to report their earnings after hours on February 6, 2025, with notable forecasts and performance trends.
news_original_title: After-Hours Earnings Report for February 6, 2025 :  AMZN, FTNT, NET, TTWO, MPWR, MTD, MCHP, EXPE, SSNC, ILMN, PINS, PFG
news_text: On February 6, 2025, various companies will report their earnings, including Amazon (AMZN), Fortinet (FTNT), Cloudflare (NET), Take-Two Interactive (TTWO), Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR), Mettler-Toledo (MTD), Microchip Technology (MCHP), Expedia (EXPE), SS&C Technologies (SSNC), Illumina (ILMN), Pinterest (PINS), and Principal Financial Group (PFG). Most companies are expected to show increases in earnings per share compared to the same quarter last year, with Amazon forecasting a 50.5% increase and Illumina a remarkable 557.14% increase. However, Take-Two Interactive anticipates a decrease of 36.67%. Analysts' expectations indicate that several companies, including Amazon and Monolithic Power Systems, are likely to outperform their industry peers in terms of earnings growth.
